pr_title: Get service version out of retryRpc loop

timeline.message: Get service version out of retryRpc loop

timeline.bodyText: Are you saying there is a retry of getRemoteServiceVersion outside of this, so we don't need to use retryRPC? I don't understand where the infinite loop is happening.
timeline.author: gpang

replies.bodyText:
When a channel creation succeeds but getRemoteServiceVersion() fails always.
In that case, retryRpcInternal will call disconnect after the rpc, then connect again. After disconnect, connect will call getRemoteServiceVersion() again.
replies.author: ggezer

replies.bodyText:
This will create connect -> getRemoteServiceVersion -> connect -> getRemoteServiceVersion loop.
connect after getRemoveServiceVersion being the second attempts.
replies.author: ggezer

replies.bodyText: I see. Then, could you add a comment here saying we don't need to retry here, since the the entire connection/channel will be retried outside?
replies.author: gpang
